languages.text: {n}Смутьян меняется в лице, делает неуклюжую попытку поклониться, потом бухается на колени.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Ваша Светлость{/d}! П-простите! П-простите, не узнал! Вы же это... первый раз на Футфоле... мы не запомнили еще..." {n}Он в ужасе замолкает.{/n}

{n}The rabble-rouser's expression changes completely, and he makes a clumsy attempt at a bow, then crumples to his knees.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I'm s-sorry! Sorry for not recognising you! Y-you see, it's... it's just that... it's your first time on Footfall, and... we didn't know..." {n}Terrified, he falls silent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Смутьян меняется в лице, делает неуклюжую попытку поклониться, потом бухается на колени.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Ваша Светлость{/d}! П-простите! П-простите, не узнал! Вы же это... первый раз на Футфоле... мы не запомнили еще..." {n}Он в ужасе замолкает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The rabble-rouser's expression changes completely, and he makes a clumsy attempt at bowing, then crumples to his knees.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'm s-sorry! Sorry for not recognizing you! Y-you see, it's... it's just that... it's your first time on Footfall, and... we haven't had time to remember..." {n}Terrified, he falls silent.{/n}

{n}The rabble-rouser's expression changes completely, and he makes a clumsy attempt at bowing, then crumples to his knees.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'm s-sorry! Sorry for not recognizing you! Y-you see, it's... it's just that... it's your first time on Footfall, and... we haven't had time to remember..." {n}Terrified, he falls silent.{/n}

Y-you see, it's... it's just that... it's your first time on Footfall, and... we didn't know..." {n}Terrified, he falls silent.{/n}

{n}The rabble-rouser's expression changes completely, and he makes a clumsy attempt at a bow, then crumples to his knees.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'm s-sorry! Sorry for not recognizing you! Y-you see, it's... it's just that... it's your first time on Footfall, and... we didn't know..." {n}Terrified, he falls silent.{/n}

{n}The rabble-rouser's expression changes completely, and he makes a clumsy attempt at a bow, then crumples to his knees.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'm s-sorry! Sorry for not recognising you! Y-you see, it's... it's just that... it's your first time on Footfall, and... we didn't know..." {n}Terrified, he falls silent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}民衆扇動家の表情が一変し、慌てて頭を下げようとして地面へ崩れ落ちた。{/n}「へ、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}陛下{/d}！あ、あなたであると気づかず無礼なことを言ってしまったことをお許しください！い、言い訳ですが…初めてあなたをフットフォールでお見かけして…我々も知らず…」{n}彼は恐怖で萎縮し、沈黙した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rabble-rouser's expression changes completely, and he makes a clumsy attempt at a bow, then crumples to his knees.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I'm s-sorry! Sorry for not recognising you! Y-you see, it's... it's just that... it's your first time on Footfall, and... we didn't know..." {n}Terrified, he falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}民衆扇動家の表情が一変し、慌てて頭を下げようとして地面へ崩れ落ちた。{/n}「へ、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}陛下{/d}！あ、あなたであると気づかず無礼なことを言ってしまったことをお許しください！い、言い訳ですが…初めてあなたをフットフォールでお見かけして…我々も知らず…」{n}彼は恐怖で萎縮し、沈黙した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}煽动者的表情立刻变了。他笨拙地试图鞠躬，随后跪倒在地。{/n}“{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}大人{/d}！我……我很抱歉，我没认出你来！你……你看，这……这只是……这还是你第一次来到落脚港，而……我们不知道……”{n}他吓得一句话都说不出来了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rabble-rouser's expression changes completely, and he makes a clumsy attempt at a bow, then crumples to his knees.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I'm s-sorry! Sorry for not recognising you! Y-you see, it's... it's just that... it's your first time on Footfall, and... we didn't know..." {n}Terrified, he falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}煽动者的表情立刻变了。他笨拙地试图鞠躬，随后跪倒在地。{/n}“大人！我……我很抱歉，我没认出你来！你……你看，这……这只是……这还是你第一次来到落脚港，而……我们不知道……”{n}他吓得一句话都说不出来了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La expresión del agitador cambia por completo, hace una reverencia torpe y se cae de rodillas.{/n} «¡{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}{mf|M-milord|M-milady}{/d}, lo lamento! ¡Perdón por no reconocerle! V-verá, es que... es que... es la primera vez que viene a Paso y... no sabíamos que...». {n}El agitador, presa del pánico, no emite otra palabra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rabble-rouser's expression changes completely, and he makes a clumsy attempt at a bow, then crumples to his knees.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I'm s-sorry! Sorry for not recognising you! Y-you see, it's... it's just that... it's your first time on Footfall, and... we didn't know..." {n}Terrified, he falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión del agitador cambia por completo, hace una reverencia torpe y se cae de rodillas.{/n} «¡{mf|M-milord|M-milady}, lo lamento! ¡Perdón por no reconocerle! V-verá, es que... es que... es la primera vez que viene a Paso y... no sabíamos que...». {n}El agitador, presa del pánico, no emite otra palabra.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'attitude de l'agitateur change du tout au tout : il tente maladroitement de vous adresser une révérence, puis se laisse tomber à genoux.{/n} « {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Votre Seigneurie{/d} ! J-je suis désolé, je ne vous avais pas {mf|reconnu|reconnue} ! V-vous comprenez, c'est votre première visite à Castel et on... on ne savait pas... » {n}Terrifié, il finit par se taire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rabble-rouser's expression changes completely, and he makes a clumsy attempt at a bow, then crumples to his knees.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I'm s-sorry! Sorry for not recognising you! Y-you see, it's... it's just that... it's your first time on Footfall, and... we didn't know..." {n}Terrified, he falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'attitude de l'agitateur change du tout au tout : il tente maladroitement de vous adresser une révérence, puis se laisse tomber à genoux.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! J-Je suis désolé, je ne vous avais pas {mf|reconnu|reconnue} ! V-Vous comprenez, c'est votre première visite à Castel et on... on ne savait pas... » {n}Terrifié, il finit par se taire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Ausdruck des Unruhestifters verändert sich komplett, er macht den ungeschickten Versuch einer Verbeugung und fällt dann auf die Knie.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}{/d}! Es t-tut mir leid! Verzeiht, dass ich Euch nicht erkannt habe! W-wisst Ihr, es ... es ist so, dass ... Ihr seid zum ersten Mal auf Footfall und ... wir wussten nicht ..." {n}Völlig verängstigt verstummt er.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rabble-rouser's expression changes completely, and he makes a clumsy attempt at a bow, then crumples to his knees.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I'm s-sorry! Sorry for not recognising you! Y-you see, it's... it's just that... it's your first time on Footfall, and... we didn't know..." {n}Terrified, he falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Ausdruck des Unruhestifters verändert sich komplett, er macht den ungeschickten Versuch einer Verbeugung und fällt dann auf die Knie.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Es t-tut mir leid! Verzeiht, dass ich Euch nicht erkannt habe! W-wisst Ihr, es ... es ist so, dass ... Ihr seid zum ersten Mal auf Footfall und ... wir wussten nicht ..." {n}Völlig verängstigt verstummt er.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalabalığı kışkırtan kişinin surat ifadesi tamamen değişiyor. Adam karşında beceriksizce eğiliyor, dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri{/d}! Ö... Özür dilerim! Sizi tanımadığım için beni bağışlayın! Y... Yani ma... Malum... Binliman'a ilk gelişiniz ve biz... Bilmiyorduk." {n}Dehşet içinde sessizleşiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rabble-rouser's expression changes completely, and he makes a clumsy attempt at a bow, then crumples to his knees.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I'm s-sorry! Sorry for not recognising you! Y-you see, it's... it's just that... it's your first time on Footfall, and... we didn't know..." {n}Terrified, he falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kalabalığı kışkırtan kişinin ifadesi tamamen değişiyor ve karşında beceriksizce eğiliyor, ardından da dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Öz... Özür dilerim! Sizi tanımadığım için beni bağışlayın! Y... Yani ma... Malum... Binliman'a ilk gelişiniz ve biz... Bilmiyorduk." {n}Dehşete düşmüş bir şekilde sessizleşiyor.{/n}
